body:
Dear users


Does anyone have knowledge of the reflectance of copper?
I am also looking for flooring products with reflectances of 0,3. It could be tiles, wooden floors or capets. Does anyone have knowledge of flooring products with such a high reflectance?




Best regards


Per Haugaard
